stimulusHtml: Which of the following can be used to replace  /* missing condition */  so that the code segment works as intended?

features.html:
The following code segment is intended to print the number of digits in the  int  variable  num,  where  num > 0.

 

int count = 0;
while ( /* missing condition */ )
{
   count++;
   num = num / 10;
}
System.out.println(count);
